artist: Artist: Jaume Serra; Artist: Pere Serra
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Trust Fund and the Sheila C. and John L. Morgan Endowement for Art Acquisition
description: image of a young man with a halo and bobbed blonde hair wearing a red tunic and blue leggings riding a white horse; man also wears an oversized red cloak with a grey lining which he extends to cover the shoulders of a man in white loincloth with brown hair and beard and worn white headscarf, walking behind horse; young man extends sword back toward walking man
title: Saint Martin and the Beggar
